alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 27 at 2:15AM MDT until April 30 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow in excess of 6 inches possible for elevations above about 5000 feet. * WHERE...Lewis and Clark County and the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over mountain passes. The heavy, wet nature of the snow could cause power outages.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
